channel.title: Hahas on Bull Traders Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Hahas on Bull Traders Documentation

item.title: Gaining Access
item.description: Gaining Access # Logging into the Wordpress admin dashboard # Head to https://bulltraders.com.my/wp-admin Enter the username and password that I provided to you If you are having difficulty or need assistance regaining access to any of your accounts you may contact me. Logging into AWS Lightsail Dashboard # Head to https://lightsail.aws.amazon.com/ls/webapp/home?# Enter the username and password that I provided to you Keeping track of my AWS Bills # Head here: https://console.

item.title: Editing Content
item.description: Editing Content # General Content # If you want to change any content on this website, unless explicitly stated on this page, the steps would probably be the following: Make sure you’re logged into Wordpress admin, then visit the page that you want to edit. Click on the “Edit with Elementor” on the top header bar. Scroll to the section that you want to edit, click on it. Edit the content on the left sidebar editor.

item.title: Managing Events
item.description: Managing Events # We have a simple event management system that allows for creating events with: Start and End Datetimes Location/Venue field Calendar View Ticketing system integrated with WooCommerce Adding a new Event # Adding a new event is simple, but make sure you follow the steps below: On your Wordpress Admin Dashboard, click on Events > Add New Events Fill up only the following: Title. Description. Put all other miscellaneous information (agenda, speakers, etc.
